ForearmsStanding.name: Standing Brachioradialis Stretch
ForearmsStanding.preparation: Cross wrists, point thumbs downward, and clasp hands.
ForearmsStanding.execution: Straighten arms and externally rotate shoulders by back. Hold stretch.
ForearmsStanding.comments: Wrist Extensors can also be stretched in this position by flexing forward wrist so hands bend toward side of forward arm. The arm can be crossed to stretch opposite wrist.
